/**
 * Configuration for PAX App
 * Environment-specific settings for local, staging, and production
 */const getEnvironment=()=>{// Check for environment variable
if(process.env.REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT){return process.env.REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT;}// Check hostname for environment detection
const hostname=window.location.hostname;if(hostname.includes('localhost')||hostname.includes('127.0.0.1')){return'local';}else if(hostname.includes('staging')){return'staging';}else{return'production';}};const configs={local:{apiBaseUrl:'http://localhost:8000',websocketUrl:'ws://localhost:8000/ws',environment:'local',debug:true,features:{voiceRecognition:true,realTimeUpdates:true,analytics:false}},staging:{apiBaseUrl:'https://mcp-staging.sameer-jha.com',websocketUrl:'wss://mcp-staging.sameer-jha.com/ws',environment:'staging',debug:true,features:{voiceRecognition:true,realTimeUpdates:true,analytics:true}},production:{apiBaseUrl:'https://mcp.sameer-jha.com',websocketUrl:'wss://mcp.sameer-jha.com/ws',environment:'production',debug:false,features:{voiceRecognition:true,realTimeUpdates:true,analytics:true}}};const currentConfig=configs[getEnvironment()]||configs.local;// API endpoints
export const API_ENDPOINTS={SEND_MESSAGE:`${currentConfig.apiBaseUrl}/api/v1/send_message`,MAKE_CALL:`${currentConfig.apiBaseUrl}/api/v1/make_call`,GET_MESSAGES:`${currentConfig.apiBaseUrl}/api/v1/get_message`,AI_AGENT:`${currentConfig.apiBaseUrl}/api/v1/ai_agent`,HEALTH:`${currentConfig.apiBaseUrl}/health`};// Configuration exports
export const CONFIG={...currentConfig,isLocal:()=>currentConfig.environment==='local',isStaging:()=>currentConfig.environment==='staging',isProduction:()=>currentConfig.environment==='production',isDebug:()=>currentConfig.debug,getApiUrl:endpoint=>`${currentConfig.apiBaseUrl}${endpoint}`,getWebsocketUrl:()=>currentConfig.websocketUrl};// Feature flags
export const FEATURES=currentConfig.features;// Debug logging
if(CONFIG.isDebug()){console.log('ðŸ”§ PAX App Configuration:',CONFIG);console.log('ðŸš€ Features:',FEATURES);}export default CONFIG;
